title: S4 Ep45: Creating a resilient society
itunes:title: Creating a resilient society
description: Repeated environmental and economic crises in recent years are encouraging many people to ask, is this really the best way to run a planet? Markus Brunnermeier tells Tim Phillips how we can do a better job of coping with shocks.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
